Independent traveller. You plan your travel on your own and don’t mind going there alone. Always walking your own path, you are no stranger to wilderness. You don’t care about the landmarks, what excites you are the things you can experience. You’d go for waterboarding, bungee jumping, cycling etc.

Tourist. You like to visit different places and try new things. The plan is to experience the place you’re visiting, no matter the weather. You want to see it all – landmarks, food, water parks and hiking paths.
Relaxed holidaymaker. When on vacation, you like to be spoiled. You prefer to have someone else do the heavy lifting for you. All-inclusive holiday, a spa or a cruise are just the thing for you!
